page.title: 34Policing in Havant
page.content:
The police station was built in 1966. The district is served by 24 hour emergency response teams from Havant and Waterlooville police stations. The district commander for Havant is Chief Inspector Steve Baxter. Havant district is divided in to 4 sectors, each headed by an Inspector. All of Havant district is committed to:

Reducing violent crime, domestic abuse

Combating anti-social behaviour

Tackling alcohol and drug-related crime. Chief Inspector Baxter said: The team of officers and staff in the district are committed both to reducing crime and to improving the quality of life for people in Havant and Waterlooville.

The SNTs are made up of a sergeant, constables and Police Community Support Officers.
